title: Spacious House for sale @ Kotte
details:
Spacious House for sale @ Kotte

Land & Floor Area -
10.5 perches + 3.5 Reservation
(2600sq,ft)

Vacant Position / fully tiled flooring
4 Bedrooms / (1A/C) with ceiling fans
3 Baths / 1 Hot water with others having provisions
Entrance lobby / Living / Dining open to front garden
Upstair TV lobby open to front terrace
Pantry with kitchen open to Lake view back yard
Rear Lake view balcony / French windows
Pipe born water with over head tank
Bricked Walls / servant toilet with bath
Solid wooden interior & exterior
Surrounded by well built walls with remote & wicket gate

10 feet road infront of the House widened towards to the main rd up to 20 feet.
900m to Ethulkotte main Road
Very closed proximity to Kotte city limit

32 million , 320 Laks (Negotiable)
